alert.note: Alert for Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:53AM CDT until July 21 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SMITH...NORTHWESTERN DE KALB AND SOUTHEASTERN WILSON COUNTIES... At 253 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Watertown, or 13 miles southeast of Lebanon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Watertown, Gordonsville, Hickman, Alexandria, Liberty, Auburntown and Tuckers Crossroads. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 237 and 260. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
